description:

The results will be logged to the console on page load, for every version of your app except version LIVE.

Want to go more in-depth in Bubble Security?

Meet Flusk Vault, our solution for Automated Security Audits for Bubble Apps! (20+ security checks, 100% automated)

name: Flusk | Security Plugin for Bubble
plugin_instructions:
Nothing to do: just open the console and see the results!

PS : these security issues are only logged in the console when NOT live version.
Which means they will be logged in test version, and all your custom branches.
